Tech Innovators Club.description: A group of tech enthusiasts and professionals who meet to discuss and develop innovative technology solutions.

Urban Creatives Collective.description: A community of artists and designers who collaborate on creative projects inspired by urban culture.

Urban Creatives Collective.daily_activity: creating urban art installations from 16:00 to 18:00
